name: An Ace Walks Into a Bar
name_original: An Ace Walks Into a Bar
description:
Maya is lured away from a cozy night in with her girlfriend by the offer of a "girls' night out" with her older sister Lynn. Unfortunately for Maya, this family reunion doesn't go as well as she hoped...

An Ace Walks Into a Bar is a visual novel originally made for Ace Jam 2022. The current build is a demo/proof-of-concept and doesn't contain the full story. (It also doesn't have music or sound effects yet.)

content warnings: acephobia, biphobia, and homophobia from a family member

Credits

Writing & Programming: Natasha Luna

Assets & Tools Used (* indicates assets modified for use in the game)

  • Lunar Magic Ren'py GUI Design* by Jaime Scribbles
  • sprites by Noraneko Games: Hana - Free Character Sprite, Miho - Free Character Sprite, Sumi - Free Character Sprite, Sora - Free Character Sprite
  • bar backgrounds: Bar Lounge Restaurant* by Life-Of-Pix, Restaurant Bar Stools* by StockSnap
  • apartment backgrounds: Bedroom Sleeping Bed* by JayMantri, Lamp Home Interior Design* by emelieewestman

(Not all of these are present in the demo.)
